    • checkUser

      @PostMapping public String checkUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, @Valid @ModelAttribute("loginViewModel") @Valid LoginViewModel loginViewModel, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors)
      handles the login form
      Parameters:
      httpSession - used to pass on the logged-in client
      loginViewModel - used to check the validity of the form data
      errors - used to return login.html with errors if anything is invalidated in the viewmodel
      Returns:
      depends on errors and if the client exists
